Minutes

Actions from the last telcon

  • Franck and Jits working on service categorization. Franck has produced a number of terms to use for that. Franck has updated the myGrid domain ontology. The new ontology will be used to generate pseudo synonyms which can then be used by the search engine (solar) to discover related services. Jits is looking into the last point.
  • Eric did a load testing on the test site. The result shows that the catalogue can not handle over 4 requests per second.
